name: Arctic Slide (Itizso)
description:
A puzzle prototype built in a week for 8-Bits To Infinity Puzzle Jam II based on the theme "Slide".

Concept

          Slide penguins across a grid to specific squares in a fixed number of moves.

Credits

          Music                                 Benjamin Burnes (abstractionmusic.com)
          Sound Effects               Juhani Junkala (opengameart.org)
          Models                             Penguin by STKRudy85 (opengameart.org)
          Programming               Itizso (itizso.itch.io)
